website_summaries.verdict: Features a simple and inexpensive no-frills design that is easy to use to find hidden cameras.
pros: Rechargeable battery lasts two to three hours
One-click design is easy to use
cons: Features three strobe light modes, so you can set it to your preferred sweeping pace.Does not have an RF mode
Some felt that it worked too slowly to find a hidden camera

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It works but you need to move it very slowly around to find cameras
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I travel frequently and this gives me additional peace of mind knowing I’m not being spied on! Easy to use, and small enough to carry in my handbag, I am considering purchasing additional detectors for my family members as a great stocking stuffer!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Miller

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: It seems exciting to work with, as I walked home and made sure that no one spied on my movements. Its small size allows me to keep it inside my bag to reveal if there are cameras inside the clothes changing shops
customer_reviews.author: lubna

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: WHY DID I BUY THIS THING? LOOKS LIKE A CHILD'S TOY AND A WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.author: HUGH

customer_reviews.title: I'm waiting to hear about this (gift).
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift and have not yet heard whether it works. I'll review when I hear something.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne G., Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is just some plastic with a red plastic window. It doesn't do anything special or detect anything. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: RKITECT

customer_reviews.title: a free happy meal toy has more value than this. PS. at least,the happy meal toy is functional.
customer_reviews.text: (sorry,I didn't take a picture of the cheap piece of crap) basically,not even worth a quarter. as soon as you move the tiny piece on the side,it pops out of the tiny machine? actually,I don't even know if it is a machine? If I bought it from a bubble gum machine,I probably wouldn't think about it as a rip-off! But,this thing cost over $30.00; I'm not rich, and thank the good Lord for amazon. they refunded my money.
customer_reviews.author: The Kitty Kat family

customer_reviews.title: No instructions.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are horrible. No explanation of the slow/fast/constant flashing lights or describing what you should/should not see as an indicator. If a "flashing" light is an indicator, then everything in the room that is reflective flashes because the actual device is flashing.
customer_reviews.author: CLC

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I set up a video camera to take a video of me trying to find it. It never showed anything from straight on to all different angles. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Philski

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this?
customer_reviews.text: Never worked for me. I even talked an amazon rep and he couldn't figure it out what's wrong the sky view so he gave me refund which I chose to get. I gave this item zero but I could it to one only.
customer_reviews.author: ESR

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate.
customer_reviews.text: Since I have started using camera's around my house and know how easy they are to install and hide I keep this little dohicky with me in my purse. I can then scan an area and know if I am being watched. I used it on my house first and it was able to detect cameras.
customer_reviews.author: LDH

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Needs to have better instruction. Pictures are even difficult to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Works 💯 perfect 👍
customer_reviews.text: I bought it a couple of days ago it's arrived before the time which was amazing for me because I desperately needed I try it out it works amazing exactly as described wow thank you so much I recommend it to all my friends you will love it
customer_reviews.author: Shloimy

product_meta.title: SpyView Compact Hidden Camera Detectors | Camera Detector for Hotels, AirBnbs & Dressing Rooms | Travel Friendly Hidden Camera Detector | Spy Camera Detector & Hidden Camera Scanner with Ultra LED
product_meta.description:
An Easy To Use & Pragmatic Approach To Confirming All Your Suspi-cions.

We've all been there. Maybe we're traveling with family or by ourselves. It could be for a job, a vacation, or just a trip to get away from life.

The second you set foot in your new 'home,' you get uneasy. You have no idea if anyone has ill intent & paranoia kicks in.

How are you supposed to function if you don't feel safe? 

That's where we at SpyView come in. Our hidden camera detector uses state of the art ultra-bright LED lights to find even the most elaborate hidden cams.

You only need 3 simple steps & 5 minutes for peace of mind. Here's what you do. 

STEP 1 - Click the flash button to get your detector ready.

STEP 2 - Look through the lens & do a thorough scan of the room. You'll notice any hidden camera as a flicker. 

STEP 3 - Click again for a slow flicker & once more for a constant one. Depending on the pace you like, choose accordingly.

And just like that, you've found every single hidden camera that's meant to infringe on your privacy & safety. 

Our detector is compact & easy to hide. It looks like any other gadget, so there's never suspicion. 

We also made it light-weight & com-pact so you can carry it in your purse or pocket.

The rechargeable battery means you don't have to fidget around trying to find replacements when you're in a foreign land. A single charge will last you the entire trip.

Add to cart now to make sure you're safe at all times.
feature_bullets: 📷 KEEP YOUR HOME SPY FREE - If you have nannies, house-keepers & people constantly over, grab our detector to keep your privacy & security intact.
📷 FIND EVERY HIDDEN CAMERA WITH ONE CLICK - Press the flash button, look through the lens & you'll see all hidden cameras as a noticeable flickesr.

📷 PROTECT YOURSELF FROM BURGLARS - Now comes with a NEW motion detecting mode that protects YOU from thieves or predators, just set in alarm mode, hang onto your door, and it will ring if it detects motion!
📷 THE PERFECT GIFT TO KEEP LOVED ONES SAFE - If your wife, children or friends are traveling abroad our detector can keep them safe at all times.
📷 PRACTICAL FOR HOTELS & AIR BNB - Our finder is easy to carry, conceal & works in any envi-ronment making it a must-have for those who travel often.
